metadata.title: CVE-2021-38575 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
NetworkPkg/IScsiDxe has remotely exploitable buffer overflows.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38575` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 2021.08~rc0-2
ovmf-ia32 - 2021.08~rc0-2
qemu-efi - 2021.08~rc0-2
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2021.08~rc0-2
qemu-efi-arm - 2021.08~rc0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2021.08~rc0-2').
